column1: The Purple Pig////The menu is designed to share and the plates are very reasonably priced
column2: especially considering how delicious everything is! Every plate was something new and incredibly delicious. The gnocchi with neck bone gravy is most definitely the best gnocchi I have ever had in my life and will be something I never forget. The blackout cake was also a stand out for me. The food was quick to come but expertly paced from beginning to end. Definitely get a cheese selection (we had the cheese with Truffle- amazing).
